Text: Hi, I'm really new to this so don't be annoyed! I literally have no idea what to do once I've downloaded this. So, could you please give me a step-by-step, click-by-click runthrough of how exactly I get from downloading to using Sibelius fully, in simple English, please?! I really don't get any of the terms you guys use.. words like 'icon' and 'window' are about as far as I can go in terms of Computer jargon. Please help!

It's free and fairly easy to use.

Thanks for this! Yes, I first tried NoPE's version but got confused by the multiple files. 
This seems to be working flawlessly for me now after I think I followed the included instructions. I successfully composed a quick musical, saved, exited, re-opened Sibelius and opened the score for more editing, so looks good! 
The only issue worth noting here is: the serial code included was rejected, I get message "invalid" when I try to enter the one you provided. Now, every time I start Sibelius it says, "Please enter your serial number" - however, when I click CANCEL, it proceeds to launch Sibelius and seems to work perfectly without having accepted any code!  (Summary: perfect so far, just hope I'm not in trial mode. I believe I'm in full mode, because when running the program, if I click "Help > Register Sibelius" I get the message "Since this copy is already registered, this option has no effect.")
SO, MASSIVE THANK YOU, LOVE THIS SOFTWARE AND THIS WORKS GREAT ON MY WINDOWS 7 PC!
